entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
